meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sumptuous.
meanings.sent1: The sumptuousnesses of the feast impressed all the guests.
meanings.sent2: The sumptuousnesses of the palace was evident in its golden decorations.
meanings.sent3: The sumptuousnesses of the picnic blanket made it feel like a royal banquet.
meanings.sent4: Her dress shimmered with the sumptuousnesses of a starry night sky.
meanings.sent5: The sumptuousnesses of the sunset painted the sky in hues of gold and pink.

meanings.definition: The luxuriousness or extravagance of something.
meanings.sent1: The sumptuousnesses of the yacht was unmatched by any other.
meanings.sent2: The sumptuousnesses of the hotel room made it a perfect getaway.
meanings.sent3: The sumptuousnesses of the dessert table tempted everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: The sumptuousnesses of the garden transported visitors to a fairy tale land.
meanings.sent5: The sumptuousnesses of the wedding reception left guests in awe.
